events.name: Endurance Z2 - 2h30 (OUTDOOR)
events.description: Steady Z2 ride at 62-71% FTP (~200-230W). Cadence 85-95 rpm. Fuel early and regularly: 40-50g carbs/hr, 350-450mg sodium/hr, 300-450ml fluid/hr.

events.name: Recovery - 45 min (INDOOR)
events.description: Easy recovery ride at 45-55% FTP (~140-170W). Cadence 85-95 rpm. AMBER/RED fallback: tempo 3x8' @ 80-85% FTP or VO2-lite 5x2' @ 110-115% FTP.

events.name: Recovery - 45 min (INDOOR)
